attributes.action: We demand an immediate general election
attributes.background:
We the people no longer feel this government is fit for purpose it doesn’t have the people’s trust or support 
We want better border control and no digital ID cards 
We the British people deserve a government that works for us

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Call an immediate general election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727309
